result.execSummary:
The defendant Robin Whaley was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: To pay the costs of the action. 60 days to pay costs or set up payment plan with the Clerk of Courts office.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robin Whaley

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Robin Whaley
Current: 1326 Division St, Algoma, WI 54201 United States  (Effective: 11-07-2017)
Prior: 105 W Main St #6, Forestville, WI 54213

Defendant Robin Whaley in court.  Colleen Catherine Nordin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews events in file. State gives sentencing recommendation. Court makes statememt, imposes sentence. Bond is no longer in effect.

Defendant Robin Whaley in court.  Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minute sheet. State gives plea agreement.  Court questions defendant on change of plea.  Rights/elements/max. penalties reviewed with defendant.  Defendant enters no contest plea.  Defendant stipulates to factual basis to accept plea.  Court finds plea made freely, knowingly and voluntarily, accepts plea, and finds guilty. Bond remains in effect.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 7, 2017 at 03:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 24, 2017 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant Robin Whaley not in court.  Colleen Catherine Nordin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls case at 3:17 pm, reviews events in file. State asks court to set another plea/sentencing date with notice being sent to defendant, unsure why she didn't appear today.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 24, 2017 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant Robin Whaley in court.  Colleen Catherine Nordin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews events in file. State indicates defendant will be pleading to the charge but needs time to fill out the plea questionnaire. State has no objection to short adjournment. Court reschedules matter to allow more time for the plea. Bond remains in effect.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 13, 2017 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Robin Whaley in court.  Colleen Catherine Nordin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews events in file. State requests a status in 60 days to allow defendant time to prepay fine/costs. Bond remains in effect.  Status conference scheduled for April 10, 2017 at 04:00 pm.
$644 given to defendant to be paid 30 days from plea/sentencing.

Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then only take in the amount and frequency prescribed.  Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.  To be fingerprinted and photographed before leaving the Justice Center.

Defendant Robin Whaley in court.  Raymond Pelrine appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel.   Defendant wants to try to resolve matter with DA, waives right to Counsel.  Court questions Defendant, finds defendant competent to proceed, finds waiver made freely and voluntarily, accepts waiver.  Defendant to make appointment with DA.  Bond set.  Status conference scheduled for February 6, 2017 at 04:00 pm.
